## Parser type

A parser is a function that tries to match whatever it expects at the given offset in the input string. Returns a ParseResult.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Parser<T, Input = string> = (input: Input, offset: number) => ParseResult<T>;
```
<b>References:</b> [ParseResult](./prsc.parseresult.md)
